summary:
Thief is an upcoming video game developed by Eidos Montreal and published by Square Enix. It is the fourth game in the Thief series of games, and the first to be released for Microsoft Windows, along with the PlayStation 4 and other unspecified eighth generation consoles. The game was initially announced in 2009 under the working title of Thief 4, but only came to be officially revealed in March 2013 through that month's issue of Game Informer.

As with previous games in the series, the game centres around the protagonist Garrett, a master thief in a fictional world inspired by Victorian and steampunk aesthetics. The game is set in a city known simply as 'The City', which is grappling with a plague and a tyrant named 'The Baron'.
name: Thief (2014)
